summary: An inspector is having a secret relationship with a woman. When she is murdered by his boss, all proof is against him.
cast: Yves Montand|François Périer|Simone Signoret|Stefania Sandrelli|Mathieu Carrière|Vadim Glowna|Claude Bertrand|Gabrielle Doulcet|Alice Reichen|Tony Rödel|Georges-Fréderic Dehlen|Serge Marquand|Stéphane Macha|Roger Muni|Malvina Penne|Michel Ruhl|Franz Sauer
title: Policía Python 357
